query:
-- Activate gal unit
UPDATE ingredientUnits SET isActive = 1 WHERE id = 60002;

-- Add pint, quart, fluid ounce
INSERT INTO ingredientUnits (restaurantId, name, displayName, isStandard, isActive, displayOrder) 
VALUES 
  (1, 'pt', 'Pint (pt)', 1, 1, 15),
  (1, 'qt', 'Quart (qt)', 1, 1, 16),
  (1, 'fl oz', 'Fluid Ounce (fl oz)', 1, 1, 17);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 49cxSE1jUeHq7LY.root --database KMmUaMc2BgFeVkUfVYZGPD --execute -- Activate gal unit
UPDATE ingredientUnits SET isActive = 1 WHERE id = 60002;

-- Add pint, quart, fluid ounce
INSERT INTO ingredientUnits (restaurantId, name, displayName, isStandard, isActive, displayOrder) 
VALUES 
  (1, 'pt', 'Pint (pt)', 1, 1, 15),
  (1, 'qt', 'Quart (qt)', 1, 1, 16),
  (1, 'fl oz', 'Fluid Ounce (fl oz)', 1, 1, 17);
